xuiClipboard
directive in module xui

Description

Component used for copying text to the clipboard.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY xui-clipboard
     xui-clipboard="{expression}"
     [on-clipboard-success="{expression}"]
     [on-clipboard-error="{expression}"]>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
xui-clipboardexpression

Value that should be added to the clipboard.

on-clipboard-success
(optional)
expression

Evaluated when text is successfully copied to the clipboard.

on-clipboard-error
(optional)
expression

Evaluated when the copy operation fails for some reason.
